Text.Page: Seir has an important assignment for you.

After the Velika Banquet incident, Velik fell into a deep sleep.
With the help of Mystel, you entered Velik’s dream, where you encountered and defeated a strange, giant butterfly. Then, in Velik's subconscious, you saw the people of Velika falling from the sky, trapped inside crystals—including the goddess herself. After you left the dream, Mystel warned that there was more.

, it's good to see you again.

I'll cut straight to the heart of the matter. Ever since the banquet in Velik's honor, city residents are complaining of severe headaches and disorientation.

I want you to find out what's causing this."I will."
Check in with Getty first. He's vital to federation operations, and seems to be in a lot of pain.

This headache isn't getting any better.

Yesterday, I almost opened the wrong bank!
Even going to sleep is hard. When I do, I always have nightmares.

A black dragon falling off a cliff, butterflies and...

Tarua had the same dream too!"Have you seen a doctor about it?"

Tarua called a doctor!

I want to go too, but I have a job to do.

The nightmares I can handle. It's the headache that's killing me.

I heard that Cottrey has a cure, so I called for help.

He should be here any minute. Maybe he can treat you, too.

This all started after the banquet, didn't it?

It doesn't seem like food poisoning, though...

Don't worry. Every sickness has a cure! We just have to find it."Everyone affected was at the banquet?"

Yes...the Velika Banquet.

Everyone I've talked to says their headache started a little after the banquet.

And they're all having the same nightmares...that's the part that confounds me.

My potions can reduce the pain and disorientation, but it's not quite a real cure, and it won't stop the dreams.

For now, just take this medicine and try to get some rest.

Felling any better?

Perhaps it really was just food poisoning...

Even Velik is in a deep sleep, after the banquet."Velik is...what?"

Hah! Hard to believe, isn't it?

Who ever heard of a god taking a nap?

It's just absurd! I almost laughed in front of her.

Welcome, .

The goddess has been sleeping a long time, and I'm getting worried."Has she gone to sleep before?"

This has never happened before...
Maybe we should ask for help.

I thought about calling a doctor, but I think that godly matters are a little out of a doctor's field of expertise.

We'll have to rely on Mystel's wisdom.
I'll take you to her.

We can leave as soon as you're ready.

I've been waiting for you.

, you and I are linked... if not in destiny, then in purpose.
"I need to know what Velik is dreaming about."
You've got to concentrate to see the goddess' dream. When you're ready, I'll lead you into the dream.

It is best if you don't share with me what you saw.

Even so, the danger is plain to see.

, you must prepare, for the world will depend on you again... and soon.

Farewell...
